page.title: 10Farming
page.content: It was a breezy spring day when we visited Mr.Wylie's farm.As you turn into the farm there is a pond with some Willow trees around it.Mr.Wylie is an arable farmer,but he does keep sheep and cattle for their meat.He farms potatoes,winter barley,spring barley, spring wheat,winter wheat and sugar beet.The potatoes are sold to the village shop and to McCain the frozen chip makers.The sugar beet is used to make real sugar and the waste pulp is good animal food.The waste from the spring and winter barley is used for animal bedding and is put down to help the potatoes to grow.Mr.Wylie's Grandfather bought the farm in 1919 for &10,000.
